title: House for Rent in Rawathawatta
description:
A downstairs house to be rented in 1st Lane Rawathawatta, Moratuwa, 200M to Galle road and Prince Of Wales College.
1. 3 bedrooms with one attached bathroom
2. Two bathrooms, Kitchen with pantry cupboards
3. Car parking slot for one vehicle with roller door
4. 2.5 km to Moratuwa Bus & Railway Station.
5. Close proximity to Medihelp, Cargills Food City, Lunawa walking path, University of Moratuwa.
6. Six months' key money is expected.
7. Available for immediate occupancy.
8. Serious buyers only, no brokers
